content: join my facebook group for community coupons and cal challenges take me to the group 1 **sizes/finished measurements** 8 wide x 9 tall 9 5 wide x 10 75 tall 10 75 wide x 12 5 tall 12 wide x 14 25 tall 13 5 wide x 16 tall 14 5 wide x 17 75 tall 16 wide x 19 5 tall **yarn** lion brand yarn mandala ombre medium weight #4 yarn 100% acrylic 344 yds/315 m per 5 3 oz/150 g cake cool 100 150 190 200 240 290 340 yds **stitch key** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet **specialty stitches / techniques** blo = back loops only **notes** 1 pattern is worked in one continuous piece from the toe upward however instructions are worked in 3 sections for ease of stitch and row counting toe continuous round heel row shaft continuous round 2 pattern may be worked in alternate yarn weights and types as desired finished size will vary 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
